title: ICICI Bank Announces Highest Dividend in 10 Years for Q4 2025
summary: ICICI Bank has declared its Q4 2025 results, reporting an 18% year-over-year profit increase along with the highest dividend payout in the last decade. The private lender has shown strong performance in net interest income and deposit growth.
content:
ICICI Bank has announced its fourth quarter results for 2025, marking a significant milestone with an 18% year-over-year increase in profit. The private banking giant has declared its highest dividend in the last 10 years, demonstrating robust financial health and strong shareholder returns.

The bank reported impressive growth in key metrics including Net Interest Income (NII) and deposit base. This performance comes amid a broader positive trend in the banking sector, with the Nifty index closing at 23,851.

The announcement follows a series of positive developments in the banking sector, with other major players like HDFC Bank also declaring dividends for their shareholders.

source.title: Rs 75 dividend per share: Tata Group company's HIGHEST-EVER reward announcement in Q4 results 2025

markdown_content:
## Financial Performance Highlights

ICICI Bank has announced its fourth quarter results for 2025, marking a significant milestone with an 18% year-over-year increase in profit. The private banking giant has declared its highest dividend in the last 10 years, demonstrating robust financial health and strong shareholder returns.

## Key Metrics

The bank reported impressive growth in key metrics including:
* Net Interest Income (NII)
* Deposit base

This performance comes amid a broader positive trend in the banking sector, with the Nifty index closing at 23,851.

## Market Context

The announcement follows a series of positive developments in the banking sector, with other major players like HDFC Bank also declaring dividends for their shareholders.
